#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define st_clk double st=clock();
#define end_clk double en=clock();
#define show_time cout<<"\tTIME="<<(en-st)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC<<endl;


#define f_in(st) freopen(st,"r",stdin);
#define f_out(st) freopen(st,"w",stdout);

#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;


char str[3005];

bool comp(int i,int j){
    return (str[i]!=str[j])? str[i]>str[j]: i<j;
}


int main(){
	 #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
     f_in("in");
     f_out("out");
     #endif
     int t,n,i,in[3001];
     scanf("%d",&t);
     while(t--){
	    scanf("%s%d",str,&n);
	    n--;
	    for(i=0;str[i]!='\0';i++)	in[i]=i;
	    sort(in,in+i,comp);
	    for(i=0;str[i]!='\0';i++,n=in[n]) putchar(str[n]);
	    puts("");
	 }
     return 0;
}
